name: Pocket : Article-View killer PLUS
description: Just click a title to open the original page (like old simple Read it Later UI.) And one more thing, add huge and easy clickable "Archive" button - now you can archive the item to click the thumbnail (in list-view) or top-right corner (in archive-view).

additional_info: (Description for Japanese Users) ・アーティクルビューを無効化し、常にオリジナルのURLを開くようにします。 ・リストビューでは、左側のサムネイルをクリックすることで「アーカイブ」の操作が可能になります。 ・タイルビューでは、アイテムの右上に大きく押しやすい「アーカイブ」ボタンを追加します。 ※詳しくは解説エントリをご参照ください。 /// Change logs [2015-05-04] + Fix for new UI. thx for your waiting :] but this version not supporting list-view with under 1200px browser width; I don't have enough time to optimize for many media-queries...plz use grid-mode in notebook pc. it works good. [2014-06-14] + Notification messages has been moved to bottom-right - it's better than top-center; causes conflict with alternative button in tile-view + Optimize css transition + Optimize alternative button shape in tile-view [2014-06-10] + Support tile-view mode! + Alternative button in tile-view mode is on the top-right corner of each item [2014-06-05] + change "Archive" button icon, thin and clean + support "Add" button - Alternative "Archive" button icon is now changed into "Add" if the item has already archived + support HTTPS + optimize clickable area - remove pointer-events:none - i realized that was completely meaningless... [2014-06-04a] + optimize clickable area [2014-06-04] + rich animation effect for alternative Archive button [2014-06-03] + initial release
